Activity: Log in to the system and check emails for any new user concerns related to the EHR system.
Review and categorize user concerns from the help desk ticketing system. Prioritize based on urgency and impact.
Address straightforward user concerns by providing step-by-step solutions via email or phone support.
Document resolved issues in the help desk log and update the knowledge base with new solutions.
Identify complex technical issues that require escalation. Prepare detailed documentation for @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2.
Follow up with @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 to ensure clinical concerns are addressed appropriately.
Organize a brief meeting with @itpm-1 to discuss recurring issues and potential system improvements.
Wrap up the day by updating the help desk dashboard and planning for tomorrow's tasks.
